snippet.title: Trails of Cold Steel III / Trails of Cold Steel IV - Announcement Trailer (PS5)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://thelegendofheroes.com/tocs/

Join Rean Schwarzer, newly appointed instructor at Thors Military Academy’s branch campus, as he begins the next chapter of his journey! Following the Erebonian Civil War, the young war hero must adjust to his new life and all the trials and tribulations that come with it.

Dive into the world of Trails and enjoy in-depth RPG gameplay that performs better than ever on PlayStationⓇ5. Includes bonus cosmetic DLC that will have your party members looking their best!

Coming Early 2024 to PS5!

#TrailsofColdSteel3 #TrailsofColdSteel4 #TOCS3 #TOCS4
